SEC. 5. REQUIRED AWARD OF ATTORNEY FEES IN ACTIONS TO ENFORCE PROVISIONS OF USERRA. Applies to any violations before or after the enactment of this Act and to pending actions filed under chapter 43 of title 38. SEC. 6. CLARIFYING THE DEFINITION OF ``SUCCESSOR IN INTEREST''.
